actions.followForMore: Follow us for more colorful moments

hero.subheadline: Authentic Mexican food, vibrant drinks, and a chill tropical atmosphere — right in the heart of Eindhoven.

about.body: LA CANTINA is more than a restaurant — it's a social hotspot where authentic Mexican cuisine meets Dutch gezelligheid. Known for our bright décor, friendly staff, and seriously good tacos, we've become Eindhoven's favorite spot for colorful evenings and memorable moments.

decor.title: Colorful Décor
decor.desc: Vibrant walls, papel picado, and warm lighting create the perfect fiesta atmosphere.

music.title: Great Music
music.desc: From Latin beats to chill vibes, our soundtrack sets the mood for an unforgettable evening.

social.title: Social Vibes
social.desc: Perfect for drinks with friends, date nights, or spontaneous hangouts in the city center.

welcome.title: Warm Welcome
welcome.desc: Our friendly staff makes everyone feel like part of the familia from the first moment.

menu.body: From our legendary tacos to refreshing margaritas, every dish is crafted with authentic recipes and the freshest ingredients.

tacos.title: Signature Tacos
tacos.desc: Our handcrafted tortillas filled with love

items.carnitas: Slow-cooked pulled pork, salsa verde, onion
items.polloAsado: Grilled chicken, guacamole, pico de gallo
items.veggieFiesta: Grilled vegetables, black beans, queso fresco
items.classicMargarita: Tequila, lime, triple sec, salt rim
items.michelada: Mexican beer, lime, spices, tomato juice
items.aguaFresca: Fresh fruit waters — ask for today's flavor

vibes.title: WHAT OUR GUESTS SAY
vibes.body: Don't just take our word for it — hear from the people who make LA CANTINA their favorite hangout.
reviews: What a vibe! My new go-to spot in the city center. The atmosphere is unmatched!
Best tacos in Eindhoven. The real deal. Authentic flavors that transport you straight to Mexico!
Colorful décor and lovely music — perfect for nights out with friends!
Probably the best Mexican food in the Netherlands. Everything was perfect!
Always gezellig! The staff is super friendly and the margaritas are incredible.
Super chill environment with amazing food. Can't wait to come back!

gallery.body: Colors, flavors, and unforgettable moments — experience the vibe before you even walk through our doors.

location.body: We're located right in the heart of Eindhoven — easy to find, hard to leave.

footer.brandDesc: Eindhoven's most colorful Mexican hangout. Authentic tacos, refreshing drinks, and the best vibes in town.
